title: Introduction to Gridsome
summary: (I followed this to make my website) Gridsome is a Vue.js-powered, modern site generator for building the fastest possible websites for any Headless CMS, APIs or Markdown-files. Gridsome makes it easy and fun for developers to create fast, beautiful websites without needing to become a performance expert.

title: COVID19 Visualization
summary: Data visualization for COVID19 confirmed and death cases
